name: length
description: Returns the number of characters in a string.

name: substr
description: Extracts a substring from a string starting at a specified position.

name: replace
description: Replaces occurrences of a specified substring with another string.

name: trim
description: Removes leading and trailing spaces from a string.
example: SELECT trim('   Hello, World!   '); -- Returns 'Hello, World!'

name: abs
description: Returns the absolute value of a number.

name: round
description: Rounds a number to a specified number of decimal places.

name: ceil
description: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to a number.

name: random
description: Generates a random integer between -9223372036854775808 and +9223372036854775807.
example: SELECT random(); -- Returns a random integer

name: date
example: SELECT date('now'); -- Returns the current date

name: time
example: SELECT time('now'); -- Returns the current time

name: datetime
description: Returns the date and time in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format.
example: SELECT datetime('now'); -- Returns the current date and time

name: timediff
description: Calculates the difference between two times.

name: count
description: Counts the number of items in a set.
example: SELECT count(*) FROM employees; -- Returns the total number of employees

name: sum
description: Calculates the sum of a set of numbers.
example: SELECT sum(salary) FROM employees; -- Returns the total sum of all salaries
